New Records: James Harden's 13 assists in the first half were the most by a Clippers player before halftime going back to 1996-97
Key Match Events: Clippers had a 36-35 advantage early in the second quarter before breaking it open with a 27-4 run
Leonard hit a 3-pointer on his first shot from the left wing with 9:57 remaining in the first quarter to tie it at 5-all
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hawks have dropped their last three games after winning four straight
Guard Jalen Johnson did not play due to right shoulder soreness
Guard Bogdan Bogdanovic also did not play due to injury management
Terance Mann also returned to the lineup and scored 12 points in 16 minutes
Others: The Clippers snapped a two-game losing streak
Trae Young led Atlanta with 20 points and 14 assists
De'Andre Hunter had 18 points for the Hawks
